0.text: Innate: Lulu is assisted by Pix, an  untargetable faerie, who follows her around and fires a barrage of 3 bolts towards Lulu's target whenever she uses a basic attack on-attack. Each bolt deals 5 − 39 (based on level) (+ 5% AP) magic damage to Lulu's attack target or to the first enemy they collide with, for a total of 15 − 117 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) magic damage on hitting a single enemy with all three bolts.
0.html: Innate: Lulu is assisted by Pix, an untargetable faerie, who follows her around and fires a barrage of 3 bolts towards Lulu's target whenever she uses a basic attack on-attack. Each bolt deals 5 − 39 (based on level) (+ 5% AP) magic damage to Lulu's attack target or to the first enemy they collide with, for a total of 15 − 117 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) magic damage on hitting a single enemy with all three bolts.
markedPassages: untargetable
5 − 39 (based on level)
15 − 117 (based on level)

1.text: Casting  Help, Pix! on an ally champion transfers Pix's help to them, causing him to fire the bolts dependent on their basic attacks.
1.html: Casting Help, Pix! on an ally champion transfers Pix's help to them, causing him to fire the bolts dependent on their basic attacks.
markedPassages: Help, Pix!

2.text: Pix snaps back to Lulu if she is too far away.
2.html: Pix snaps back to Lulu if she is too far away.

0.text: Active: Lulu and  Pix each fire a magic bolt towards the target point, each one dealing magic damage, reduced to 70% against  minions, and  slowing them by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Lulu and Pix each fire a magic bolt towards the target point, each one dealing magic damage, reduced to 70% against minions, and slowing them by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds.
markedPassages: Pix
minions
slowing

1.text: Enemies take  25% damage from a second bolt.
1.html: Enemies take 25% damage from a second bolt.

0.text: Active: Lulu can cast Whimsy on herself or the target champion.
0.html: Active: Lulu can cast Whimsy on herself or the target champion.

1.text: Enemy Cast: Lulu launches a spell onto the target enemy champion that upon arrival  polymorphs them into a harmless critter for a duration, during which their base movement speed is reduced by 60, and  disarming them for the same duration.
1.html: Enemy Cast: Lulu launches a spell onto the target enemy champion that upon arrival polymorphs them into a harmless critter for a duration, during which their base movement speed is reduced by 60, and disarming them for the same duration.
markedPassages: polymorphs
disarming

2.text: Self / Ally Cast: Lulu instantly casts erratic magic upon the target allied champion or herself, granting the target  bonus attack speed and  30% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed for the next few seconds.
2.html: Self / Ally Cast: Lulu instantly casts erratic magic upon the target allied champion or herself, granting the target  bonus attack speed and  30% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed for the next few seconds.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed
30% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Lulu can cast Help, Pix! on herself or the target unit.
0.html: Active: Lulu can cast Help, Pix! on herself or the target unit.

1.text: Enemy Cast: Lulu sends  Pix to the far side of the target enemy for 4 seconds, dealing them magic damage and  revealing them for the same duration.
1.html: Enemy Cast: Lulu sends Pix to the far side of the target enemy for 4 seconds, dealing them magic damage and revealing them for the same duration.
markedPassages: Pix
revealing

2.text: Self / Ally Cast: Lulu sends  Pix to the target ally for 6 seconds, granting them a  shield for 2.5 seconds if they are a  champion.
2.html: Self / Ally Cast: Lulu sends Pix to the target ally for 6 seconds, granting them a shield for 2.5 seconds if they are a champion.
markedPassages: Pix
shield
champion

0.text: Active: Lulu enchants herself or the target allied champion,  knocking up surrounding enemies for 0.75 seconds. The target remains enchanted for 7 seconds, gaining  bonus health, 40% increased size and an aura that  slows nearby enemies for the duration, lingering for 0.25 seconds.
0.html:
Active: Lulu enchants herself or the target allied champion, knocking up surrounding enemies for 0.75 seconds.

The target remains enchanted for 7 seconds, gaining  bonus health, 40% increased size and an aura that slows nearby enemies for the duration, lingering for 0.25 seconds.
markedPassages: knocking up
bonus health
bonus health
slows

abilities.concerningText: Active: Lulu and  Pix each fire a magic bolt towards the target point, each one dealing magic damage, reduced to 70% against  minions, and  slowing them by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds.

Active: Lulu and  Pix each fire a magic bolt towards the target point, each one dealing magic damage, reduced to 70% against  minions, and  slowing them by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds.

Enemy Cast: Lulu launches a spell onto the target enemy champion that upon arrival  polymorphs them into a harmless critter for a duration, during which their base movement speed is reduced by 60, and  disarming them for the same duration.

Self / Ally Cast: Lulu instantly casts erratic magic upon the target allied champion or herself, granting the target  bonus attack speed and  30% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed for the next few seconds.

Self / Ally Cast: Lulu instantly casts erratic magic upon the target allied champion or herself, granting the target  bonus attack speed and  30% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed for the next few seconds.
Enemy Cast: Lulu sends  Pix to the far side of the target enemy for 4 seconds, dealing them magic damage and  revealing them for the same duration.
Self / Ally Cast: Lulu sends  Pix to the target ally for 6 seconds, granting them a  shield for 2.5 seconds if they are a  champion.

Active: Lulu enchants herself or the target allied champion,  knocking up surrounding enemies for 0.75 seconds. The target remains enchanted for 7 seconds, gaining  bonus health, 40% increased size and an aura that  slows nearby enemies for the duration, lingering for 0.25 seconds.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power
+20 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Inspire: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units of you 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INSPIRE: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units of you 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Motivate: Healing, shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MOTIVATE:  Healing,  shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  750

Keywords

  • reverie

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+20 ability haste
+100% base mana regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – PUFFCAP TOXIN: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Healing or  shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sanctify: Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) enhances you and them with 10% − 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 5 − 20 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit on basic attacks for 6 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SANCTIFY:  Healing or  shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) enhances you and them with 10% − 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 5 − 20 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit on basic attacks for 6 seconds.

active.originHTML:
Active

0.concerningText: Self / Ally Cast: Lulu instantly casts erratic magic upon the target allied champion or herself, granting the target  bonus attack speed and  30% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed for the next few seconds.

Active: Lulu enchants herself or the target allied champion,  knocking up surrounding enemies for 0.75 seconds. The target remains enchanted for 7 seconds, gaining  bonus health, 40% increased size and an aura that  slows nearby enemies for the duration, lingering for 0.25 seconds.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Enemy Cast: Lulu launches a spell onto the target enemy champion that upon arrival  polymorphs them into a harmless critter for a duration, during which their base movement speed is reduced by 60, and  disarming them for the same duration.

Self / Ally Cast: Lulu instantly casts erratic magic upon the target allied champion or herself, granting the target  bonus attack speed and  30% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed for the next few seconds.
Self / Ally Cast: Lulu sends  Pix to the target ally for 6 seconds, granting them a  shield for 2.5 seconds if they are a  champion.

Active: Lulu enchants herself or the target allied champion,  knocking up surrounding enemies for 0.75 seconds. The target remains enchanted for 7 seconds, gaining  bonus health, 40% increased size and an aura that  slows nearby enemies for the duration, lingering for 0.25 seconds.
